name: Ghost wants to stay dead
description:
This is a game made with godot 3.5 .
Created in one week for a game jam, the theme was "Death is good"

(The web version does not have audio, best experience on desktop)

Credits

Game by Lavande Potions - lavande-potions

Lowpoly Buildings by GualtierisGG - gualtierisgg.itch.io

Musics midi version from BitMidi - bitmidi.com

Musics metal version by DavidKBD - davidkbd.itch.io

Made with Godot 3.5 - godot engine
